metadata.title: CVE-2021-3144 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In SaltStack Salt before 3002.5, eauth tokens can be used once afterexpiration. (They might be used to run command against the salt master orminions.)

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
